reviews.review: This is fun fps but with a twist of stopping the bombers or be the bomber or save the hostages or be the one who has captured the hostages. This game is modifiable feature like garry mod works with it. I reccommend buying this game.
This fantastically fun to play shooter is my favourite time-vampire.
Counter-Strike am a really cool guy. eH shoot poeple and dosen't afraid of anything.

A játék vegyes érzelmeket kelt bennem, mivel a hibái ellenére is kedvelem és naponta játszom vele. FullHD monitorhoz jobb mint az 1.6, egyedüli idegesítő dolog számomra a nagyobb hitbox, ami könnyebb fejlövést tesz lehetővé, ez néha felfőzi a vizet az emberben, hiszen akad szerencsétlenebb nap amikor tényleg nem jön össze az ilyen miatt semmi sem, viszont ha szerencsésebb a helyzetünk akkor mi is előnyt kovácsolhatunk belőle. A csapatmunka itt is nagyon fontos akárcsak az 1.6-ban, sőt tán egy fokkal több is kell hozzá. Hangulatban hozza az elődöt. Összesítve: 87/100

This game is a legend, root of most modern FPS's today.
Legendary.
If you don't have this game you're a noob and I don't want to hear what you have to say about FPS's. Cause your opinion is invalid.   That is all.

If you play this game the right way, and you really set yourself into the role, tac-tics and physics of this game, it's great. Action packed, requires a whole lot of tac-tics, and will require your full attention at any time. WARNING: IT'S EXTREMELY TIME CONSUMING. Me, using 2800 hours so far, and I'm far from tired of the game. It's simply one of the best games I've ever played, though it has some negative sides, which have been even worse after the MAC-update. It deserves 9/10 from me, and in my opinion, it did the job great, taking the players from Counter-Strike 1.6 and Condition Zero to a whole new level of gaming and graphics.
Great game, much better than Global Offensive.
I recommend that you don't play this. only because assholes like me will make you want to rage quit =)
This game is really fun, I do Recommend to play with bots to start it off....Even though the bots still kick my ass. But it's a really fun game to play with friends.
It's CS, just fucking get it, lol
Das ist das beste Spiel der Welt, mit der meisten Abwechsel von Awp bis Knife
Played a few timess, i'd try it.

Just got Vac-Banned because of nothing .... I think I got report-spammed so I would stay away from this game if you don't want a vac-ban.

If you want to take the risk, go on and buy it.
It's actually a great game.
Love this gmae but there is no point in buying it anymore with CS:GO out
The best game ever played... hope awesome updtaes... el mejor juego jugado... espero actualizados mejores...
Hatte früher noch auf meinen alten acc noch so um die 5000std+ und es wird nie langweilig wenn man mit Freunden spielt
Excelente jogo, unico com pura ação e diverção garantida! =D
This game is to REALLY get good at fps games and has a couple of stratagies in its maps

Não tinha recomendado ele ainda. Mas nem precisa né :). Tem uns pequenos problemas: Não da pra ouvir os sons dos passos igual no 1.6. Famas e Defender são mais pesadas que AWP por exemplo, hitbox meio estranho as vezes, você atira na cabeça e não pega. Por isso acho o 1.6 melhor, mas não que o CSS seja ruim.
It should Have Osama Bin Laden in it but its pretty good
just throw money at this game

ヘッドショットの気持ちよさは随一。
最近のカジュアルゲーFPSとは違い、FPSの根底にある、
『狙って撃つ』楽しさが詰まっている。
最近のFPSと比べて、格段にプレイヤースキルが問われることは間違いないが、
根気強くやり続けて自分のスキルアップを体験すると共に、
FPSの楽しさを見出していただきたい。
Fun if you want to have a great time

Counter-Strike Source. Some people occasionally still play this game.
The only real reason to buy this game in this decade or in the next decade is as a resource pack for Garry's Mod.
Your dick will shrivel up to the length of a 9 year olds.
должна быть у каждого в стиме!

Wer nach einem action geladenem shooter sucht ist hier falsch. In Counter Strike warten keine "auf gut glück abschüsse" sondern  strategische Elemete. Das Spiel ist für jeden der gerne im Team kämpft und gerne Nachdenkt sehr zu empfehlen.

Updated graphics and tweaking to CS 1.6

Pretty hard to get into unless you're a CS pro, but fun.
fun game for playing with friends
tres bon jeu en reseau !!! plein de souvenir sur le net !!
Very fun game to play one of the best fps shooters :P
so amazingly fun. hard to get the hang of, but has awesome maps (ASSAULT)
It's a CoD rip-off, tries too hard to be like CoD, only shitter with PS1 graphics
Awesome but it got me VAC banned from all source games besides gmod for aimbotting

Counter-Strike is one of those games that I can only play for like too minutes. Only this one has better graphics.This time the thumbnail actually lives up to the game's graphics. id say $ worth spent
Ein hammer Spiel, habe es schon seit dem ich denken kann, es ist es einfach wert :D

You can't aim down sight, half the skins are backwards, people move 200mph, you die with 1 hit, there's only 1 fucking game mode, there is no single player, the controls make no sense at all

And this is one of the most popular fps game ever made?
Отличная игра, провел в ней много времени и не жалею, играю по сей день

All time faviourte fps game for me. Beware newcomers as this game will require at least a few hundread hours of gameplay before you can be considered an averaged skilled player. Counter strike also offers other game modes such as surf, gungame, deathmatch, minigames, deathrun, bhop, hide n' seek and many others.. 10/10.

If you have gmod, but don't have this game, then gmod will be awful.
I also like to play this game when I am bored, not online because everyone is srsly pro and i die instantly.
however playing with bots is really really fun
